p: All the recombinant SP-D's were expressed in HEK293 cells and purified by mannan affinity followed by gel filtration chromatography as published ( 21). SDS-PAGE analysis and Western blot analysis were performed as described in detail for the characterization of NpSP-D ( 19). Endotoxin levels were determined with the ToxinSensor LAL assay kit (Genscript, Piscataway, NJ) and endotoxin values of all SP-D preparations were below 50 pg/Î¼g protein.
